shortened_description: Urgent request to transfer $75,000 from Harold Harrison's account ending in -4567 to Acme Corp, account number 9876543210 at First National Bank with swift code FNATUS33. The reference for this payment is INV-2023-10-24-HH. Deadline: Today.
reason: Customer email requesting urgent funds transfer, mention of specific vendor and account details, specified swift code, and confirmation from Front Office.
